attributes.action: Banks to provide 1 month Mortgage break...
attributes.additional_details:
All Banks to provide a 1 month holiday option for MORTGAGE customers per year (or agreed term)

Everyone is struggling these days hence I think the following should be discussed...

For most people mortgages are the single biggest financial commitment yet there seems to be no help from the banks to give people a ‘1 month’ holiday option – I most certainly don’t have this option with my bank.

This could free up 100’s pounds for mortgage payers to catch up on dept, home improvements or a holiday perhaps, thus spending money helping the economy. I understand this sits with the banks but pressure from the government is need come to some agreement
